summary.para: Programmatically starts an update for all items.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

remarks.para: This method returns immediately and the synchronization manager performs the synchronizations in a separate process from the calling application.

summary.para: Programmatically starts an update for specified items.

param.name: dwInvokeFlags
param.para: Specifies how an item should be invoked using the enumeration values.

param.name: clsid
param.para: The CLSID of a registered application to be invoked for an update.

param.name: cbCookie
param.para: The size of pCookie data, in bytes.

param.name: pCookie
param.para: A pointer to a private token that identifies an application. The token is passed in the method.

returns.para: This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED and E_OUTOFMEMORY, and the following:

description.para: The errors occur during a synchronization update.

summary.para: Exposes methods that enable a registered application to invoke the synchronization manager to update items.

remarks.para: This interface is implemented by the synchronization manager.
A registered application calls the methods of this interface to update all items or to update specific items.
